.. -*- mode: rst; encoding: utf-8 -*-

========================
 GromacsWrapper package
========================

The :mod:`gromacs` package makes `Gromacs`_ tools available via
thin python wrappers. In addition, it provides little building blocks
to solve commonly encountered tasks.

.. _Gromacs: http://www.gromacs.org


Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   gromacs/init
   gromacs/core
   gromacs/building_blocks
